text: haey brasenbae krom muoy knongchamnaom puok anak mean chomnue leu avei delke ban banhchoun mk aoy khnhom( sahou eb) haey krom muoychamnuon tiet kmean chomnue noh chaur puok anak teangoasa atthmot choh rhautadl a l laoh vinichchhy rveang puok yeung . haey a l laoh kuchea anak vinichchhy da brasaer bamphot
